bio:
Artist, designer, founder of @modernmacrame
Author of the new book by the same name.

posts.caption:
@goldenruledesign and I spent the evening downtown for a staycaytion at the new Portland location of @thehoxtonhotel .
I had taught at the one in Amsterdam a few years ago, and in London with the amazing @earlofeastlondon. For the opening in Portland, they asked local creatives to curate 10 books for each of the rooms.
Of course there’s a copy of my book there...✨ We had a great time, dinner, walking around in the crisp chilly night.seeing live music, and sleeping in....
Also the lobby is super pretty, the pink ceiling!
I’m looking forward to getting mezcal at their soon to open rooftop bar soon. #hoxfriends #ekportland

A quiet day at home with this guy and @breckbrew Christmas Ale before some holiday travel. Every time I’m with you I’m in good company. This guy will always stop what he’s doing to share a quiet moment of holiday snacks. #breckbrew #christmasale #breckenridgebrewerypartner #winteringoodCo

It was too difficult to choose who was going to win the plant hanger/ @newmadela hanger/ book that I am doing it TODAY!
Hey @ritual_roots you are the winner!!
-
Congrats!
Woot! -
I’m going to be sharing another giveaway soon. Stay tuned!

My idea of festive... imagine carrying a Xmas tree this way! 🌲
But I’m Grateful for the seasons.
Grateful for the rain.
And still Grateful for the days when I could drive #littlegreenmg with the top down this May.the day before my book launch party. #soloparking

Yesterday we started for real planning our wedding!
We visited the site with our planner, @gatherevents, and walked the grounds with fresh eyes.
7 years ago, @goldenruledesign and I went to a wedding on Sauvie island together. He invited me to be his date after only being together for a month. We swam in the river late night and slept in the back of his Volvo. -
Visiting this place always feels special. A dream away from the city. On our we way to the beach, we would always point out this property, owned by @jhinteriordesign and @yiannidoulis. But we didn’t know them. It was just a dream.
7 years later, @goldenruledesign works in @jhinteriordesign office, and we are fortunate to call them both friends.
The icing on the cake (will there be cake?😳 too many choices!!🙈🧀🍇🥧🍿) is that next September, this is where we will tie the knot.
I couldn’t feel more excited to marry this amazing man and feel over the moon grateful to have found such an incredible team of planners to help make it all happen. #porterkatz2019

Nature is full of magic. Thinking today about one of the final days of my book tour, @caitwisha and I decided at the last minute to stay in Moab and get up at 5am to explore #archesnationalpark before the heat crept over the horizon.
-
I’m seeing so many photos of California burning and hoping that everyone is safe. -
Like the future of our country depends on it. #vote #midtermsmatter

Hey friends! I’m hosting a giveaway with @newmadela for one of these circle plant hangers, a copy of my book and a @modernmacrame plant hanger!
To win!
-Like this photo, -Follow @newmadela and @modernmacrame -comment with where you’ll hang it!
-tag two friends!
-winner announced Monday!
Hood luck, lovely people!

I love to cook, have late night dance parties with friends, sew, go for hikes, take photos, design spaces, sing. Eat. Learn new languages.
-
But what I do everyday is run @modernmacrame with a small team of amazing women.
-
It’s been over 6 years since I learned macramé from my mom, and 3 years since I quit my day job and made this company my full time work(plus all the other things I do). This year I wrote a book that’s in its 3rd printing!
-
Sometimes the business flows, the ideas come in floods. And sometimes we feel stuck in a pinch point (how are we going to pay for all this inventory?! Make these new videos!? Get all my ideas off the ground?!)
-
80% of Modern Macramé is providing rope, cord, special beads and other notions for all your crafting needs. The rest is teaching and designing custom work.
-
I’m sharing all this here, because many people who know me, don’t realize that ROPE is our main product. We imported 40 tons of it last year, and this year we are growing. Which is super cool! And it makes me laugh when I think about it.
Besides rope, COMMUNITY and inspiration are my business, and the thing that gets me up every morning.
-
This weekend, (and as much as possible) SHOP SMALL.
Every dollar you spend when you shop small has a direct impact on the small business owners you support. I tagged my outfit, everything I’m wearing came from a small women owned business. Who are the businesses in your community you are excited to support?
-
Thank you for reading and for your support!
-
And use code DREAMWEAVER to take 25% off everything on the modernmacrame.com (rope, pillows, art, plant hangers, macramé kits, my book! etc)
Get your mom or sister or girlfriend one of my books and some rope. She will thank you.
#craftingcommunity -photo by @threadcaravan after our workshop in Asheville this summer at fav @eastforkpottery

I traveled to Los Angeles this week for work. I arrived on an early morning flight, and then headed to a workshop, to a dinner to celebrate the launch of my book, and @uber helped me get there. And on my last day in town, I had a few hours to kill, and so decided on a detour to the ocean. Getting around in an UberX was easy and stress free. #sponsored #doorsarealwaysopening
Nothing like celebrating with loved ones. Sometimes. It’s as simple as cracking open Christmas Ale from @breckbrew and slicing some ripe fruit. #Christmasale #breckenridgebrewerypartner
